title: Communion
alt: The local police, growing increasingly concerned about this church, ask parishioners to take a sip of wine and then spit it back out for DNA testing. It's blood, and it matches a 1970s murder victim.
transcript:
[Cueball and Danish are taking a stroll.]
Cueball: How was Christmas? Did you go to church?Danish: Yup. We celebrated the birth of a child, then we ate of his flesh and blood.[Silence from Cueball.]Danish: Seriously hope we got the right child this time.
